item.description:
All,

We plan to play flag-football every weekend, and this is no exception. Saturday at 4pm just across the road from the Alewife - Red line 'T' Stop head toward Rindge Ave. We will be on or near the football field. Everyone is welcome to join us.

Also, b/c we don't charge for this meetup, we are putting a men's flag-football league together to help us cover costs. We will be starting July 19th and registration has already begun. The first two teams to signup will not have to pay referee fees. Free Agency, rules, registration, etc. can all be found at our site...

http://baffl.blogspot...

Please let us know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
-Frank
item.name: FLAG FOOTBALL - SAT 4PM - RUSSELL FIELD
